channel.title: Help with Ricscape v3 and port forward
channel.description:
FIXED
also, when i try to log onto my server on my other computer it wont work, so i guess i didnt port forward correctly? although i was pretty sure i did, ive set up static IP addresses before. but yeah some assistance here would be great as well.

item.title: Help with Ricscape v3 and port forward
item.dc:creator: @Uber_Newb Uber Newb
item.description:
@Uber_Newb wrote:

This is regarding your player status situation:

There SHOULD be a folder labeled characters or char in the RicScape folder,
then in that foler there SHOULD be individual text files for every person that has logged into your server,

something like this:

[code][ACCOUNT]
character-username = Haxor
character-password = poop

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3244
character-posy = 3518
character-rights = 3 <---------CHANGE THIS # TO 1= Mod 2= Admin 3= Owner
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = localhost
character-lastlogin = 20070917
character-energy = 100
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 0

[EQUIPMENT]
character-equip = 0 11824 1
character-equip = 1 10412 1
character-equip = 2 10413 1
character-equip = 3 5698 1
character-equip = 4 11143 1
character-equip = 5 10234 1
character-equip = 6 -1 0
character-equip = 7 11142 1
character-equip = 8 -1 0
character-equip = 9 10947 1
character-equip = 10 11981 1
character-equip = 11 -1 0
character-equip = 12 -1 0
character-equip = 13 11774 1

[LOOK][/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Help with Ricscape v3 and port forward
